text: My sis love the Mango Tango ice cream, the staff was so nice to let her try the flavors before ordering. Very attentive & friendly, he also gave us an additional stick of Sotteok. Enjoyed the snack here!

Stated on webpage that they close at 9.30pm but was told at the shop they close at 9pm. Wanted to try the ice cream before buying but was told no trying. Hostile nd unwelcoming service w substandard ice cream. Might as well go burnt cones with better service or just go vending machine and be done. Waste of time n money.
Would give 0 star if that's an option. Avoid at all cost. This place does not respect customer time. Ordered and waited 1 hour before cancelling my order. What a scam!
My son got food poisoning after eating their ice cream.  Will never patronize them ever again
